name: The Spanish Treasure
overview: The game was originally created with GAC in 1986 and published by Trom (Tony Rome) Software. In 1993, it was re-released in a new version. You, an international superspy, are forced to bail out of your plane when the pilot of another plane shoots your pilot. And as soon as your parachute reaches the ground the killer is coming for you. Packed with excitement and adventure, see if you can retrieve the treasure and make it safely back to Britain.
